issues.detailed_explaination: The code uses the `jakarta.xml.bind.annotation.XmlElement` annotation, which is part of the JAXB API. JAXB has been deprecated in Java SE 11 and removed in Java SE 17. This can lead to compatibility issues in future Java versions.
issues.suggestion: Consider using alternative libraries for XML binding, such as Jackson or Gson, which are more actively maintained and provide better support for modern Java features.
issues.severity_reason: The use of deprecated and removed APIs can lead to significant compatibility issues and maintenance challenges.
